posting_body: ***COMING SOON****COMING SOON**** COMING SOON***possibly as early as October*******
Here at Chelsea Court we offer:
Just Minutes from Georgia State College; shopping, eateries and banking.
Also I-285 Accessible, Marta Bus Line at your doorstep and a friendly On Site team to assist you with your needs.
Prices are starting at Just $900.00 (plus water/trash) = $961.00
***Please confirm availability if you would like to apply in the future

Our qualifications are: make three times the amount of the rent ($2,625 gross), and we will  perform a criminal, credit, rental and employment background check and you must make three times the amount of the rent*.
*Some Restrictions May Apply and Prices are Subject to Change
790 N. Indian Creek Drive, CLARKSTON GA
